block.p: The Mets ended spring training Saturday by setting an unwanted franchise record, losing for the 21st time this spring, 8-3, to Tampa Bay in St. Petersburg, Fla. Mike Pelfrey, the Mets' fifth starter, allowed 8 runs -- as many as he had all spring -- and 10 hits in four innings.
Pelfrey returned to Port St. Lucie, Fla., where he will make one minor league start before the Mets recall him to pitch April 13 against the Washington Nationals.
